```{r}
print_tree <- function(path = ".", prefix = "", exclude = c("analysis/renv", "kde-ranking.Rproj"), root = path) {
  items <- list.files(path, full.names = TRUE)
  rel_paths <- sub(paste0("^", normalizePath(root), "/?"), "", normalizePath(items))
  
  # Exclude full relative paths (e.g., "analysis/renv")
  keep <- !rel_paths %in% exclude
  items <- items[keep]
  rel_paths <- rel_paths[keep]
  base_names <- basename(items)
  
  # Sort folders first
  is_dir <- file.info(items)$isdir
  order_idx <- order(!is_dir, base_names)
  items <- items[order_idx]
  rel_paths <- rel_paths[order_idx]
  base_names <- base_names[order_idx]
  is_dir <- is_dir[order_idx]

  for (i in seq_along(items)) {
    name <- base_names[i]
    is_last <- i == length(items)
    connector <- if (is_last) "└── " else "├── "
    cat(prefix, connector, name, "\n", sep = "")

    # Recurse only if directory and not excluded
    if (is_dir[i]) {
      # Check if this dir is in exclude
      if (!(rel_paths[i] %in% exclude)) {
        new_prefix <- paste0(prefix, if (is_last) "    " else "│   ")
        print_tree(items[i], new_prefix, exclude, root)
      }
    }
  }
}

print_tree("~/PDev/kde-ranking", exclude = c("renv", "kde-ranking.Rproj", "analysis/kde_files", "output"))
```
